title: difference
description: Write a function `difference` that takes two lists and returns a new list containing all elements that appear in exactly one of the two lists (symmetric difference), preserving order of first occurrences from the first list followed by the second list.

examples.explanation: Elements in first list but not in second (1, 2) plus elements in second but not in first (5, 6)
No common elements, so all elements from both lists
All elements are in both lists, so symmetric difference is empty

hiddenCases: (check-expect (difference (list a b c) (list c d e)) (list a b d e))
